description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.16dMPIIWiQasj8Z7]{Starsinger}

You’ve transcended mortality like a butterfly emerging from its chrysalis, your essence infused with stardust and unearthly energies. Your type changes to fey, and the transformative effects of your power ballad become permanent. You become immune to the harmful effects of space and of celestial bodies such as stars, and you no longer need to breathe. You can enter a star or gas giant and exit from another star or gas giant within the same system instantaneously.

In addition, your affinity with your sacred weapon increases. You gain the ability to cast a 6th-level spell of your choice as a spell-like ability once per day. The save DC of the spell is equal to 10 + the spell’s level + your key ability score modifier, and your caster level is equal to your character level
